        if match:
            return False

    if txt == '':
        return False
    else:
        if not_a_word.match(txt):
            return False
        else:
            if not_last.match(txt):
                return False
            else:
                if is_letter.match(txt):
                    return True
                else:
                    return False

    word=word.split(' ')

    #check if the last element of the list is a word
    if word[-1].isalpha()==False:
        return False

    # if the last character is a word it is not the last character
    else:
        return True
